oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Geometrical parameters identification for zero dispersion in square lattice photonic crystal fiber using contour plots
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MANI ROJA, M
SHEVGAONKAR, RK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: finite element analysis
optical fibre dispersion
photonic crystals
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A square lattice photonic crystal fiber is analyzed by means of finite element method. Using contour plots, the geometrical parameters like lattice period Lambda and air filling ratio (d /Lambda ratio) for zero dispersion at a wavelength of 1.55 mum have been identified.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the International Conference on the Signal Processing, Communications and Networking, Chennai, India, 4-8 January 2008, 116-118
